name: Magic Castle
description: Magic Castle AI Technology Research Laboratory is a high-tech laboratory located in Singapore, focusing on the research, development and application of artificial intelligence technology. Founded in 2023, the laboratory is praised for its innovative research and technological applications. At present, it has received financial support and industry resource support from a number of investment institutions, including IOSG, Galaxy Digital, D1 VC, The LAO, Ming Ng and MetaCartel.
